member.param: Pagenumber, (default:1)
Elements per Page, (default:10)
Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, 'null' disables Random Sorting, (default:null)

Type of the Activity ('null' = Filter disabled, possible values: BITMASK: 'Mountains = 1','Cycling = 2','Local tours = 4','Horses = 8','Hiking = 16','Running and fitness = 32','Cross-country ski-track = 64','Tobbogan run = 128','Slopes = 256','Lifts = 512'), (default:'1023' == ALL), REFERENCE TO: GET /api/ActivityTypes
Subtype of the Activity (BITMASK Filter = available SubTypes depends on the selected Activity Type), (default:'null')
IDFilter (Separator ',' List of Activity IDs), (default:'null')

Locfilter (Separator ',' possible values: reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), tvs + TOURISMVEREINID = (Filter by Tourismverein), mun + MUNICIPALITYID = (Filter by Municipality), fra + FRACTIONID = (Filter by Fraction)), (default:'null')
AreaFilter (Separator ',' IDList of AreaIDs separated by ','), (default:'null')
Distance Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 15,40 Distance from 15 up to 40 Km), (default:'null')
Altitude Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 500,1000 Altitude from 500 up to 1000 metres), (default:'null')
Duration Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 1,3 Duration from 1 to 3 hours), (default:'null')
Hightlight Filter (possible values: 'false' = only Activities with Highlight false, 'true' = only Activities with Highlight true), (default:'null')
Difficulty Filter (possible values: '1' = easy, '2' = medium, '3' = difficult), (default:'null')
Taglist Filter (String, Separator ',' more Tags possible, available Tags reference to 'v1/ODHTag?validforentity=activity'), (default:'null')
Active Activities Filter (possible Values: 'true' only Active Activities, 'false' only Disabled Activities
odhactive (Published) Activities Filter (possible Values: 'true' only published Activities, 'false' only not published Activities, (default:'null')
GeoFilter Latitude Format: '46.624975', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null')
GeoFilter Longitude Format: '11.369909', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null')
Radius to Search in Meters. Only Object withhin the given point and radius are returned and sorted by distance. Random Sorting is disabled if the GeoFilter Informations are provided, (default:'null')

member.param: Pagenumber
Elements per Page

Type of the Activity (possible values: STRINGS: 'Berg','Radfahren','Stadtrundgang','Pferdesport','Wandern','Laufen und Fitness','Loipen','Rodelbahnen','Piste','Aufstiegsanlagen' - BITMASK also possible: 'Berg = 1','Radfahren = 2','Stadtrundgang = 4','Pferdesport = 8','Wandern = 16','Laufen und Fitness = 32','Loipen = 64','Rodelbahnen = 128,'Piste = 256,'Aufstiegsanlagen = 512)
Subtype of the Activity ('null' = Filter disabled, BITMASK Filter = available SubTypes depends on the selected Activity Type)
IDFilter (Separator ',' List of Activity IDs, 'null' = No Filter)

Locfilter (Separator ',' possible values: reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), tvs + TOURISMVEREINID = (Filter by Tourismverein), mun + MUNICIPALITYID = (Filter by Municipality), fra + FRACTIONID = (Filter by Fraction), 'null' = No Filter)
AreaFilter (Separator ',' IDList of AreaIDs separated by ',', 'null' : Filter disabled)
Distance Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 15,40 Distance from 15 up to 40 Km) 'null' : disables Filter
Altitude Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 500,1000 Altitude from 500 up to 1000 metres) 'null' : disables Filter
Duration Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 1,3 Duration from 1 to 3 hours) 'null' : disables Filter
Hightlight Filter (possible values: 'null' = Filter disabled, 'false' = only Activities with Highlight false, 'true' = only Activities with Highlight true)
Difficulty Filter (possible values: 'null' = Filter disabled, '1' = easy, '2' = medium, '3' = difficult)
Active Filter (possible Values: 'null' Displays all Activities, 'true' only Active Activities, 'false' only Disabled Activities
SMGActive Filter (possible Values: 'null' Displays all Activities, 'true' only SMG Active Activities, 'false' only SMG Disabled Activities
SMGTag Filter (String, Separator ',' more SMGTags possible, 'null' = No Filter, available SMGTags reference to 'api/SmgTag/ByMainEntity/Activity')
Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, 'null' disables Random Sorting
member.returns: Result Object with Collection of Activities Objects
